body.p: Language-support files support the translation from a source language into a target language. You must have at least one language-support file installed for the source language from which you want to translate.

can translate from the following source languages:
Afrikaans
Arabic
Belarusian (No POE support)
Catalan
Chinese (simpl.)
Chinese trad.) <liCroatian
Czech
Danish
Dutch (restrictive)
Dutch (permissive)
English (U.K.)
English (U.S.) <liEstonia
Finnish
French (Canadian)
French (national)
German (national)
German (DPAnat)
German (newnat)
German (Swiss)
Greek
Hebrew
Hungarian
Icelandic
Italian
Japanese
Korean <liLatvia <liLithuania
Norwegian (bokmal)
Norwegian (nynorsk)
Portuguese (Brazilian) <liRomanian
Polish
Portuguese (national)
Russian <liSlovakian <liSlovene
Spanish
Swedish
Thai
Turkish
Ukrainian (No POE support)
accepts any target language that is supported by your operating system.
